name: Rooftop Streak
description:
This is my first Unity project ever. I used this game as a way to teach myself various aspects of the engine as well as coding. This is a FPS speed running game where your goal is to shoot as many targets as you can while reaching the end of the level as fast as possible.

Since this is my first project ever, I am open to any criticism and appreciate any comments made on my game. Thank you for taking a look!
